problem_text_cn: 如图,在圆的内接四边形ABCD中,∠ABC=120°,则四边形ABCD的外角∠ADE的度数是()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, in the inscribed quadrilateral ABCD of the circle, ∠ABC = N_0, then the degree of the exterior angle of the quadrilateral ABCD ∠ADE is ()
raw_answer:
解:∵四边形ABCD是圆内接四边形,∴∠ADC+∠B=180°,∵∠ADC+∠ADE=180°,∴∠ADE=∠B．∵∠B=120°,∴∠ADE=120°．
故选:B．
